inclusion.criterion: Pancreatic tumor regardless of its nature
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to participate in a clinical research protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of pancreatic surgery or biliary diversion and / or digestive
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient taken in charge for chronic pancreatitis without tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Physical or mental condition does not allow participation in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: ASA classification (American Society of Anesthesiologists) IV-V or life expectancy <48
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, but is currently experiencing symptoms and has been diagnosed with pancreatic adenocarcinoma. She will continue on IV antibiotics until seen by ID as an outpatient.
